tool_description: The Cryptocurrency Token Presales API provides information on upcoming, past and current PreICOs. It allows you to sort by filters, trends, profile tickers and more.
name: Cryptocurrency Token Presales
title: Cryptocurrency Token Presales

api_list.name: PREICOs - Profile
api_list.description: Returns returns detailed information of the PREICO
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-preico-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/preico/Profile?name=DocTailor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-preico-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
